title: Teacher Competency Enhancement Program for Game-Based Learning (GBL) Implementation

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental game design principles and experience in teaching science subjects
context.additional_context: Focus on developing competencies in designing and operating science curriculum-linked GBL in mobile-centric restricted technological environments

learning_goals: Learners will be able to explain the five core game literacies (basic, advanced, design, operational, and evaluative) required for implementing Game-Based Learning (GBL).
Learners will be able to create and operate GBL scenarios tailored to the characteristics of science subjects using smartphones.
Learners will be able to measure the effectiveness of GBL activities aligned with learner needs using a three-tier (formative/process/summative) evaluation tool.

resources: Open-source game templates linked to science curricula
Tablet rental system for practical training
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
